1219140.name: 2D Vtuber Cutiecats
1219140.description:
The 2D Vtuber Cutiecats program can help those who produce content such as YouTube or live streaming. You can record and edit the video quickly. You can use it immediately in the PC environment without any special equipment. Put your difficult equipment behind you and make it comfortable. This is not the end of the program; it will continue to evolve.

[How to Use]

1. Run program.
2. Open the guide.
3. Set the custom.
4. Record.
(4-1). Change movement and facial expressions by pressing the key.
5. Check the recorded video within the program folder.
